basics.name: Maya Mallaby-Kay
basics.summary: PhD Candidate at the University of Chicago studying Astrophysics.

education.institution: University of Michigan, Ann Arbor MI

awards.title: NSF Graduate Research Fellow
awards.summary: The purpose of the three year NSF Graduate Research Fellowship Program (GRFP) is to help ensure the quality, vitality, and diversity of the scientific and engineering workforce of the United States. A goal of the program is to broaden participation of the full spectrum of diverse talents in STEM.

awards.title: Department of Energy SCGSR Fellow
awards.summary: The SCGSR program provides supplemental awards to outstanding U.S. graduate students to pursue part of their graduate thesis research at a DOE laboratory. This was used to perform research at Argonne National Lab.
